nodes.text: Shell was a Hutt kajidic that—along with Desilijic, Besadii, Gnuda and Ramesh—was a patron of the Delphidian privateer Sidon Ithano. Shell and the other kajidics granted Ithano a letter of marque that granted him permission to conduct raids and deliver cargo in his CSS-1 Corellian Star Shuttle Meson Martinet along the hyperspace trade routes of Hutt Space, including the Ootmian Pabol, the Pabol Hutta, the Shag Pabol.
